solution_line_template: The second scroll is {first_scroll_age} + {first_scroll_age} / 2 = {first_scroll_age} + {first_scroll_age}/2 = <<{first_scroll_age}+{first_scroll_age}/2={second_scroll_age}>>{second_scroll_age} years old.
